properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 7 at 4:00AM EST until February 7 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Mount Holly NJ
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations near two inches.
Winds gusting as high as 45 mph.

* WHERE...Carbon and Monroe.

* WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 7 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous
conditions could impact the evening commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Due to very windy conditions, areas of
blowing snow are expected. Impacts from blowing snow, including
reduced visibility and slippery road conditions could linger for
several hours after the snow has stopped falling.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM EST THIS EVENING
